metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7842 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
If a document's Referrer Policy attribute is set to "no-referrer" sometimes two network requests are made for "<link>" elements instead of one. One of these requests includes the referrer instead of respecting the set policy to not include a referrer on requests. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 57.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5
firefox-globalmenu - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5
firefox-mozsymbols - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5
firefox-testsuite - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5').
